ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.2_0: a certain nun was walking for almsfood along a street in the same town.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.2_1: and after going, he sat down on the prepared seat.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.3_0: and the people there gave her a meal. They then asked her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.6_0: “How can nuns not come to them?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.7_0: “Venerables, in such-and-such a place there are malicious dogs, a temperamental ox, and it’s muddy.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.8_0: Please don’t go back to this place.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.9_0: Another nun, too, approached that family while walking for almsfood.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.9_1: and after going, he sat down on the prepared seat.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.10_0: and the people there gave her a meal. They then asked her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.11_0: “Venerable, why don’t the nuns come here?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.12_0: And she told them what had happened.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.13_0: People complained and criticized the monks,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.14_0: “How can a nun act like this?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.15_0: “Is it true, monks, that a nun acted like this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.18_0: “... How can a nun act like this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.19_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.20_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.21.1_0: ‘If a nun is stingy with families, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:2.1.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:2.1.6_0: there are four kinds of family: the aristocratic family, the brahmin family, the merchant family, the worker family.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:2.1.8_0: if she thinks, “What can I do so that other nuns don’t come?” and she then speaks disparagingly of the family in the presence of nuns, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:2.1.9_0: if she disparages the family in the presence of a family;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:2.2.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:2.2.2_0: if she is not being stingy with families, but describes the disadvantages as they are;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:2.2.4_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:2.2.5_0: The fifth training rule is finished.
